lines.content: * The Duke class is the entry point into the chatbot program.
* It scans in user input and adds/deletes/lists tasks based on the user input.
* It prints the action reply to the CLI.

* Create and initialize a Deadline Command.
* @param fullCmd The full user input in String form.
* @param ui The ui object responsible for displaying deadline messages to the CLI.

*  writing it into the saved data file of tasks and displaying a message on the CLI.

* @throws DukeException if the format of the Deadline command are invalid.

* The DeadlineTask class encapsulates information and methods about a Deadline Task
* and inherits functionality from the Task class.
* Create and initialize a new Deadline Task.
* @param taskName Name of the new Deadline Task.
* @param date Date of the new Deadline Task.
* Returns a string representation of a Deadline task for the user.
* @return Type of task, status, followed by the name of Deadline task and date the task is due.
* Returns a string representation in the format of how the Deadline task should be saved in the data file.
* @return String for chatbot to save into a saved data file of tasks.
* The EventTask class encapsulates information and methods about a Event Task
* and inherits functionality from the Task class.
* Create and initialize a new Event Task.
* @param taskName Name of the new Event Task.
* @param date Date of the new Event Task.
* Returns a string representation of a Event task for the user.
* @return Type of task, status, followed by the name of Event task and date the task will occur.
* Returns a string representation in the format of how the Event task should be saved in the data file.
* @return String for chatbot to save into a saved data file of tasks.
* @param taskName The name of the task the user wishes to add.
* The TodoTask class encapsulates information and methods about a Todo Task
* and inherits functionality from the Task class.
* Returns a string representation of a Todo task for the user.
* @return Type of task, status, followed by the name of Todo task.
* Returns a string representation in the format of how the Todo task should be saved in the data file.
* @return String for chatbot to save into a saved data file of tasks.
